import React, { useState } from 'react' import firebase from '../firebase' const AddTimeEntryForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [time, setTime] = useState('') function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() firebase .firestore() .collection('times') } return (

Add Time Entry

setTitle(e.currentTarget.value)}>
setTime(e.currentTarget.value)}>
) } export default AddTimeEntryForm
